action.name: Set value
action.param: max( 100/distance( Object2d.X, Object2d.Y, LightZond.X, LightZond.Y )*LightZond.Power, Object2d.LightPower )

action.name: Execute Javascript
Set return value
action.param: lerp( Function.Call( "1dNoise", int(Function.Param(0)) ), Function.Call( "1dNoise", int(Function.Param(0))+1 ), Function.Call( "fract", Function.Param(0) ) )

action.name: Set return value
action.param: lerp( Function.Call( "2dNoise", int(Function.Param(0)), Function.Param(1) ), Function.Call( "2dNoise", int(Function.Param(0))+1, Function.Param(1) ), Function.Call( "fract", Function.Param(0) ) )

action.name: Execute Javascript
Execute Javascript
Call function
action.param: PlayerZond.X+Function.Call("GetVectorResulteA"){###}PlayerZond.Y+Function.Call("GetVectorResulteB"){###}angle( PlayerZond.X+Function.Call("GetVectorResulteA"), PlayerZond.Y+Function.Call("GetVectorResulteB"), Object2d.X+random(-Function.Param(3), Function.Param(3)), Object2d.Y+random(-Function.Param(3), Function.Param(3)) ){###}Function.Param(2){###}distance( PlayerZond.X+Function.Call("GetVectorResulteA"), PlayerZond.Y+Function.Call("GetVectorResulteB"), Object2d.X+random(-Function.Param(3), Function.Param(3)), Object2d.Y+random(-Function.Param(3), Function.Param(3)) ){###}Function.Param(4)+1
